title: During prayer can we say Alhamdulillah if we sneeze or blow our nose with a tissue? Assim al hakeem
transcript: sheena she says if i'm praying and my nose is running can i blow my nose with a tissue no problem at all you can keep a tissue in your hand all the time whenever it runs you blow or clean your nose no problem what about if i sneeze can i say alhamdulillah yes you can say alhamdulillah and there's no problem in that the prophet sasam was leading prayer once and one of the companions sneezed and said alhamdulillah and he did not tell him anything
